thread.title: BRIEF-Stepan Co Executes $350 Mln 5-Year Revolving Credit Facility Agreement

title: BRIEF-Stepan Co Executes $350 Mln 5-Year Revolving Credit Facility Agreement
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Stepan Co:
* STEPAN COMPANY EXECUTES $350 MILLION FIVE YEAR REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY AGREEMENT
* STEPAN CO - HAS ENTERED INTO A FIVE YEAR COMMITTED $350 MILLION MULTI-CURRENCY REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY THAT MATURES ON JANUARY 30, 2023
* STEPAN CO - ENTERED INTO 5 YEAR COMMITTED $350 MILLION MULTI-CURRENCY REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY THAT MATURES ON JANUARY 30, 2023 WITH A SYNDICATE OF BANKS
* STEPAN CO - ‍CREDIT AGREEMENT REPLACES COMPANY‘S PREVIOUS $125 MILLION REVOLVING CREDIT AGREEMENT THAT WAS SCHEDULED TO EXPIRE IN JULY 2019​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
